3ErgS5YQLJFEyWA-AgJAOg.text: Friends and myself were looking for some good reasonably priced seafood on our recent trip to Las Vegas. Someone recommended we try this place. We are so happy we did. The food was great, tasted wonderful and was really "Hot and juicy". We had shrimp, clams and lobster with a few sides. All superb. The best part about he experience was the staff. They were funny, bright and right on it whenever we needed anything. Parking was easy and there is plenty of seating. Definitely recommend this location when visiting Las Vegas. This will be a regular stop for us every time we are in town.

O9VSJ-UvyE6aKD8utKcjYw.text: the food was absolutly great ...grrat service great experience ... definitly neex to come back ...and are waitress was awsome ..!

TIDINeMXj4ZaSFClx2-Xog.text: This is the best seafood place in Vegas.  Period.  End of discussion.  End of review.

MnUajqANqP7IZdAqGY5x-Q.text: Worst customer service ever .DC hot and juicy is the best . This place needs better management and customer service .

uvypMqW79xEm-Pitw8JLPg.text: Like i said in my check-in, we love H&J and this is our first time at this location. All the food was best ever. Our server Aubrey gave us really attentive and personable service. We will definitely come back next time in Vegas!

1y3y0cqrh6mL8GeBjBmuWQ.text: Jessica was the bomb server! ! She did a great job of explaining the menu items and gave great recommendations on the seasonings. She even helped us deshell the crawfish. We will definitely be back for more.

Kuw2Elj5g2K3o2EmYKzxow.text: Very tasty seafood, which was served in a plastic bag all mixed together, that you dump on the table and just dig into. Wait staff was attentive, we were greeted by the hostess and sat right away, all in all a pretty good experience.

-zRHX_PCuY4B1DkIEgtJ1w.text: Came here for my birthday yesterday, i was not impressed AT ALL.The staff at the Spring Mtn locations are more personable and perky than these ppl, i just didnt get the awesome vibe that i usually get at the othr locations

l6aI6Z9Hz0JVXAwmwOtWyQ.text: Garlic shrimp.... yummy! This new location of Hot N Juicy, impressed the shrimp outta me. I was very impressed with the cleanliness and customer service. compared to the other Hot N Juicy i would say this is the best location they have. They have television for you sports fanatics. My best friend and I had dinner here one evening, we ordered the garlic shrimp and lobster legs. It was delicious and had no complaints at all. Service was phenomenal they checked on you and refilled your waters all the time. I will definitely go back to this place, had a great experience!

P-qYtxErIQ8GT-BCydkG7A.text: This place is comparable to boiling crab. I prefer BC's sauces, but if there isn't a BC around, this place still satisfies your craving. Prices are ok, service is very friendly and fast. I got the shrimp in hot and juicy medium with corn...pretty great, crawfish in garlic butter mild with corn...pretty good, catfish basket-  don't get the fish basket, didn't taste right.

idjiI4ooHLlb68I7f7PVZg.text: My bf and I wanted to try something different so we decided on hot and juicy. So glad we did, service was fast and super friendly! Our server Aubree ROCKED! Super sweet and very knowledgable of the menu. Some of the most flavorable shellfish we've had anywhere.

FK_muB252z5Y-PR6KBLw0A.text: Great seafood.  Order the seafood in the bag, by the pound.  The fried options in baskets are not as good.  You cannot go wrong with the food.  Though place was not busy (only 3 tables occupied), still took a good 5 minutes before we got seated during lunch.  Once you get seated, they are prompt and right at your elbows for the refills.

oRSX2FfzlQXd6Fxx65eSPQ.text: I give 5 stars for great service but I will not be back. One must have a taste for this food. I ordered crawfish (1 pound) and shrimp (1 pound). I also ordered 2 snow crab baskets with Cajun fries. The shrimp and crawfish were staring right back at me and were in full shells. I guess I assumed they would be breaded and fried. I'm not knocking this place as some people like their food this way. I did however enjoy snow crab baskets. They aren't big enough to share but totally worth it. (13.99 each). The staff was very accommodating to let me exchange the crawfish for a snow crab basket. My husband and I did eat the shrimp because we love shrimp no matter what. It's in full shells with eyes too. A little weird but still good.

mEky4PIvx_irEeJzEMUE7A.text: I had a great experience at this restaurant. The food was great and the service was even better. I think her name was Shelby. Can't wait to go back.

knwV8T9iAiJXnOaRi2vzvw.text: First time to hot n juicy from 3 years living here and don't know why we waited so long!! Compared to the other crawfish restaurants..this place is my favorite!! Got medium lemon pepper shrimp, corn, potato & sausage and was totally an amazing choice!! It was soooo good!! Had jessica & Rick as servers and they made the experience fun, energetic & making us wanna come back tomorrow!! What topped it off compared to the other places was that they give you gloves to use (I have a cut on my finger so didn't want to get the sauce on it) and they have sinks outside the bathroom to wash your hands! Oh AND the whole ambiance and feel of this location I LOVEEE!! It's interior design was so nice and clean and the fact that it wasn't busy made the experience so relaxing while we ate!! Thanks for coming to this side!! See you tomorrow :)

ThVmmXK3xRNxtFA8bcbjjg.text: It's solid shrimp. Good oysters. Service was so-so.

lHeG-NT49zLnOOjWc9RLFg.text: Just ate there today and I think their sausage gave me some food borne illness.  I say this because the group we ate with didn't seem to be affected except those who ate more of the sausages.  Usually me and my fiance have iron stomaches, but this is not the case.  It's ruining my Vegas trip.  Me angry.  So is my stomach.  Never visiting any of their establishments again.

YIkcfLFrfNe7rqg1R_6cOQ.text: I have always enjoyed going to hot and juicy but this time was Awesome!   Not only was the food great but our waitress Jessica and Aubree were on their game.  They were attentive, friendly and engaging.  They really made the whole experience great.  Way to go Jessica and Aubree!

6Q63zWWr6jvlB5gxC-PRlA.text: So happy they opened one on my side of town!  When we got there, there were still tables open. We had a party of 8, but the guy server refused to seat us until at least half of our party was present. Which the eighth was a four month old baby that wasn't even going to eat. It was understandable until the tables started filling up and the only table left was ours that a girl server purposely left reserved for us. Instead of the guy server out of courtesy asking us if the rest of the party was here, which they were, but were trying to find parking, (the parking isn't that great in this plaza by the way) he was pretty darn close to just seating the next party that arrived. I felt that was rude in and inconsiderate as we were patiently waiting. The least he could have done was ask if they were here or not. They could have been walking to the door and he probably would have just seated the other party if it weren't for my husband telling the girl server that our party was parking. That was frustrating.  We finally sat down and ordered. When it came to us waiting for the food, it was taking a lot longer than I had experienced at the other two Hot N Juicy's on Spring Mountain. We were probably waiting about 45 minutes to an hour. We only ordered shrimp and the rest were chicken baskets. The other two would have the food out a lot quicker.  Definitely no more than a 20 minute wait after ordering.  Every time we needed something we had to keep looking for our server as he never really came to check up on us.   At this location, I felt the service was about a 1 1/2 stars. I love the food and the location which bumped my rating to 3 stars. I love how they have a sink in the hall to avoid the clutter in the bathrooms. I would choose this location as my least favorite out of the three, but since it's less than 10 minutes away from where I stay, I will be returning for that reason.

5OZEF1S8CNXVPLQrLqGy9A.text: After living in the Las Vegas valley for several years and have never gone to Hot and Juicy Crawfish. Now I can say that I went. But I won't be back. The food was good  the atmosphere great, the service is what is lacking. We were seated and then asked if we wanted anything to drink, I said no because I would like to see the menu. Well no one came .  We waited and waited.  I said we would wait 2 more mintues and then we would leave.  Finally were served.  Food took forever even though tables that were seated after us received their dinner before us. I never knew who my server was. They all asked or stopped by the table. But never when I needed them. It's too bad.

f0dh-Atw7JcX37LItQWx9w.text: Definitely a must visit when you're in Vegas. Away from the hustle and bustle of the strip, this place is such a gem, who needs seafood buffet when you have Hot N Juicy? This place offers affordable and delicious seafood!  My friend and I both got 1 lb of shrimps each (with heads on). Each pound was $13 which was pretty affordable. We both got them in the Hot and Juicy special sauce which I highly recommend by the way! The waitress was very accommodating and service was very quick. We had such an awesome meal and I couldn't ask for anything else better. This place is a must re-visit when I come back to Vegas in the future!

photos.caption: Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Las Vegas, NV, United States. 1 pound of shrimps in hot and juicy sauce !! So so good

bZ8VqTepFwEzHkI5rm2xuA.text: Amazing food and amazing servers today, very very please.  My hubby, daughter n and I all left happy.

R93amcItzwR4DFkTgqv0sg.text: Fantastic!  We were immediately seated and within a few minutes Katie came to take our drink order, after answering our questions. She brought us plastic bibs and took our order promptly. We had catfish with cornmeal breading, accompanied by their Cajun fries. Catfish and fries were nice and hot--fresh out of the kitchen.  Catfish had a wonderful taste and the fries were well seasoned--no salt required. Our server answered more of our questions about some of the other meal offerings, which encouraged us to return and try some other foods. If you enjoy seafood, this is the place.  If you enjoy Cajun food, this is the place.

jaw46vXh4WkycuKFWWw-SQ.text: Great tasting sauce! I had the snow crab, clams, shrimp, and king crab. I would come back. Great service. Friendly staff.

QsFkW5gVC2-Ck5bVnI3Fwg.text: This place lacks customer service. Last month we were here and our waitress took the order and someone else dropped our food and never saw her again. We had to ask another waitress for our bill so we can pay and leave. Today we came  and was seated immediately, two parties came after us and their orders were taken right away while we were still waiting for whoever was suppose to be our server. We waited about 5more mins and no one showed up so we got up and left. Will never ever come to this place again.

kDKaEaJYi4HqnOpS8Rempg.text: Don't come here if you're expecting to watch a sports game that you're interested in watching cause they won't change the channel. 9 TVs in this place but they won't even change one!!!! Very disappointing.

nQJmIdQdPCcz6ccoaNmVmA.text: Good place for crawfish when it is im season. close to the strip...a little pricey thats why 3 stars

kxiIl-cg6YolwBpP9CifOA.text: I dont know why I haven't been to this location before.  Same quality food but not a long wait like their other locations.

yhzFgcOPsHLcxgNvZmfZqg.text: Great food loved the crab legs, shrimp and crawfish.  Lots of spices and Cruz our server was amazing.  Will be coming back.

Gyywj2FbW6ySFt64Qt063g.text: A bit overpriced like others have said - but I have to admit the hot n juicy sauce is just as good as my parents crawfish boil special sauce. We did get mild because the waitress said their stuff is spicier than average, and I was glad because it was spicy as hell, but the sauce was delicious. The corn was over cooked in the bag and there was what seemed like too much shrimp vs crawfish. The beer and micheladas were only $5 so cant beat that for a strip restaurant. Wouldn't go again, but gave it 4 stars for the sauce alone. My husband did like the snow crab legs in the bag - we got the combo bag.

photos.caption: Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Las Vegas, NV, United States

1YuQbPnEW331E7cb2RRozg.text: They have a simple small variety of seafood selection. You order by the pound and it depends on the market value of the day.   I order a pound of a shrimp which is about $12 a pound today with lemon pepper sauce and mild seasoning. The rest of my family order a couple pounds of crawfish with a really high spice level.  The sauce was really watery when I received my bag of shrimp. It was still tasty and I enjoyed every single piece of shrimp they gave. I was hoping the sauce would be thicker to stick on the shrimp better.  When I sampled a couple of my families crawfish, the spice level was too much for me. I am not really into spicy food so be aware of the spice level you choose.   The customer service was okay. A little bit slow on refilling on drinks and hard to find a server to ask for a few condiments such as ketchup.  Overall experience was good. I'd come back here whenever I crave seafood and to try out their different seafood and sauce.

qJT2XEpmBNxt39EvGVSsfA.text: What a shame, I certainly liked the food here but the service on my last visit was less than acceptable. I was alone so I was told to have a seat at the bar, that's okay I've down that before. I sat at the bar for about five minutes without being acknowledged by anyone, another customer pulled up a seat at the bar a few mines later and she was immediately assisted by server Aimee. I'm not one to cause a scene, but I had to flag down a server and let her know I wasn't served as yet. Food finally arrived with no offer of gloves, but Taylor made it right by quickly getting me a setup. It was a poor start, but thanks to Taylor, I might stop in and give this place another try.

8buvuNkufvAWkXB7OA6aYQ.text: If your not afraid to get a little messy then hot n juicy is a must! They have a variety of seafood such as shrimp, lobster, snow crab, blue crab and of course crawfish. You pick your protein, then they have a variety of sauces. I personally like them lemon pepper the most!   Don't know how to eat crawfish? Don't worry they will demonstrate for you!    This is a fun date night or great for a group to share! They do get very busy very quickly though so a lot of times there is a little wait but it is well worth it!

7jpl8Ukks6zqJa9f1bJ-1Q.text: This place is very convenient for me, especially since I don't need to make the drive to Chinatown to get my spicy fix. Better drink selections. Despite how busy it gets around dinnertime, the staff are very attentive. Long wait between 6pm-9pm (30min to an hour) on both weekdays & weekends (then again I would question a dead restaurant at this time). Would definitely keep returning!

Zi1DcJZyz76745aZx7MLsA.text: This place is awesome, and I can't wait to go back!   My son, his girlfriend, and I went out for a fun little mom/son date night. I had never been here before. First of all, I could smell the seafood when I opened my car door! It smelled so good! We walked in, and I noticed there was white plactic on all of the tables, and no silverware. My first thought was that this was going to be an interesting dinner.    We were seated really quickly. We arrived around 9, and they close at 10, so the dinner rush had already come and gone. Our server was named King, and he was great. He explaned the menu, made some recommendations, and explained how to order. We decided on 2 sets of the meal that came with 1lb of shrimp, 1lb of crawfish, corn, potatoes, and sausage. One we chose the hot and spicy seasoning on baby spice, and the other was the garlic butter seasoning also on baby spice. Glad we picked baby spice on both, as even that had a little kick to it!  The server brought out the food, and it came out in plastic bags, and super super hot! We dug in! Being newbies to this place, we honestly had no idea what the shrimp came whole hahaha my son's girlfriend and I laughed and gave each other a look when we realized we were going to have to shell and pull the faces and legs off!  The food was awesome. The corn was the best corn I have ever had. The potatoes were kind of bland, but the fish was so good. I personally liked the hot and juicy flavored sausage the best, but the garlic butter corn and shrimp.   I am totally going back for a date night with my husband. I would highly recommend! Oh, and they give you a bib, and offer gloves if needed :)

BK7cOsg4oU38swBzwJRGNQ.text: Stuffed! Go hungry to this place! A lb of shrimp is A LOT OF DELICIOUS SHRIMP! Don't forget to order your corn. Super delicious! It's a bit out the way from the strip but totally worth the drive! @hotnjuicycrawfish #lasvegasmusteat #sooooogood !

7NwR4bB0UyhfpDtxb7IxfQ.text: Place was so good and clean ,we got the shrimp with crawfish with the hot and juicy mild sauce

XRvNWwpOCfYS81jGDP8DsA.text: This place is fun and the food is delicious, once you get the shell off anyways. You order your food and it comes out in bags filled with the shrimp or crawfish you chose and a medley of corn cob, potatoes, sausages, and some other things. The food can be pretty hot. You almost burn your fingers a bit if you don't let the food cool off for a few minutes.

ZQiDta2Xlv64BDDd3FZVcQ.text: This location  has consistently pleased me, no watered down hot n juicy sauce ( other locations sauce at times can seem watered down)!  Usually I'm doing take out so I've called ahead.  I'm in and out in a short time even though they are generally pretty busy.  I will continue to be a patron and I would absolutely suggest this chain and this restaurant to others. I love it.

MT2zPOiHK-wKJrFHjuMRFQ.text: I've eaten here several times in the past at this location and the food is usually good. My daughter took me here today for Mother's Day and it was horrible. The Hot N Juicy sauce which I normally get was sweet. It tasted like they added sugar to it. On top of that, they tried to charge us for food we didn't even have. I'm very disappointed in Hot N Juicy. We should have gone with our first choice...The Boiling Crab.

05_IcFKwKaYIikBrcVhBCA.text: So good! I usually get the cajun mild. It has enough spice for flavor but not so spicy that you're tearing up. I've had the blue crab, crawfish, shrimp, and clams. They're all really good, but the blue crab definitely takes work. If you're not used to eating whole crab, these will give you trouble. I recommend getting a cup of rice to mop of that yummy sauce. The fried calamari appetizer is really good, too. When I order the shrimp, I get a whole pound and I can finish it no problem. If I get an appetizer, than I just get 1/2 pound.   This is my favorite location because there's plenty of seating and parking is easy. Parking can be a pain at the locations on Spring Mountain.

photos.caption: Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The aftermath, lol.
Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Las Vegas, NV, United States. blue crab
Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Las Vegas, NV, United States. crawfish

S3fF9wYm92OkWVJEvlC5oA.text: I've been 3x now, twice for dine in and once togo. I've been in the middle of the day on a weekday and at dinner time on a weekend. They always seat us promptly even when they're busy. Everyone is nice, professional, and we never had to ask for drink refills or ask twice for anything.  I get everything with Hot n Juicy sauce (mix of all the sauces) mild. I love the king crab, cooked perfectly, sweet, and juicy. The lobster was mediocre, over cooked, and rubbery. The shrimp is easily my second favorite, cooked to perfection and absorbs the flavor well. The crawfish is definitely not worth it in my opinion. (I'm from New Orleans so I have high standards for crawfish.)  It's definitely worth trying at least once. And as others said, be ready to get messy! Also be prepared for a wait if you go during dinner time.

photos.caption: Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Las Vegas, NV, United States. King crab
Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster

EUQv03XEJgHOis2qdr5Whw.text: Yummmyyy omg ! So much fun and the concept is fun with working for the shrimp and crab legs. The corn and potatoes and also the fries were crispy and spicy ' I can't wait to go again and order w full basket next time .   You will get Messy so chose something that can afford to have cleaned  .  Server Adrian did excellent 'n Great service and attentive   Bianca Vader

PjmwGC1Cg7NBT42A-EU1eQ.text: We were in neighborhood and craving spicy seafood boil, decided to give this place a try. We've been to Boling Crab (BC) in LA and few others like it so this isn't our first time. They're located in huge strip lot which offers ample parking. I was surprised how big the place is inside. There are a lot of tables, and booths, plus large bar counter. They were able to accommodate our party of five quickly.   Since it was Cinco de Mayo, we started off with a some micheladas, which were delicious. Good size portions for $8. The fried calamari was tasty, but I had better. We had 2 pounds each of the shrimp, mussels, and blue crab with half-dozen corn, potatoes and sausages. For seasoning sauces we got their the famous "Hot N Juicy" Special, done medium spice. All seafood arrived in separate bags with exception to corn, potatoes and sausages which were combined. Everything tasted delicious and we plowed through everything pretty quickly. Quality of fresh seafood and flavors were good. Spice level was on point without being overbearing. Along with bibs and gloves they provide, I still end up getting it all over myself. I don't think the plastic gloves is suitable on crabs because they puncture quite easily. I ended up removing it.  Overall, food was delicious and the service was great. The staff checked on us regularly and was efficient. We will definitely be back .

photos.caption: Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Corn, potatoes and sausage
Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Blue crab

qmrnyayD75D53b7h-O_otQ.text: This is one of my new staples when I come to visit.   Very delighted with this location. It's located in a strip mall type area and upon entering you see there is ample seating. My party of 2 got there just in time. It was fairly empty when we arrived, but by the time our food came (which wasn't long) it was almost a packed house. The tables already have a cover over them and bibs and gloves are waiting for you.   Service was pretty good. Our waiter asked if this was our first time there and went over the menu with us. I had already checked it out online so I knew what I wanted to order. We started off with delicious margaritas and Hawaiian bread. Next we order a la carte with 1lb of snow crab legs, 1lb of shrimp, sausage, 2 corns and 2 potatoes all in the hot and juicy sauce with a spice level of mild. Our waiter warned us that their spice levels were a step above the normal and I'm glad I listened and stuck with mild. I love spicy food and that was a good first choice. Everything was delicious. I should've ordered more potatoes and corn because 1 was just not enough. It would be nice if they had a 3 for $2 type of deal for the corn and potatoes.   Expect to get messy. Roll up your sleeves and enjoy!

NYodYXCQSQPtmiQ9jADdXA.text: I had been wanting to try a seafood boil for a very long time and finally got around to coming into this crawfish joint. They have medium and large seafood boils with Cajun or varying seasoning. We chose the Cajun seasoning. It was spicy!! I got 4/10 for spice level.  I also enjoyed the Po' boy and realized maybe seafood boils are better enjoyed in bigger groups. I loved the food, but my hands and breath did have a strong garlic smell all day afterward. Nonetheless, they give you gloves and bibs to avoid spillage and messiness. I'll come back with a bigger group to avoid taking leftovers home. I'll definitely have another po' boy then too. Come to eat if you enjoy family style seafood at a good price, and aren't afraid to get a little messy.

photos.caption: Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Shrimp Po&#39; boy
Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Shrimp Po&#39; boy
Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Shrimp Po boy

6DfU_5Lcf0UxztzfAVruPg.text: I'm so happy I found a Cajun-style seafood place finally in Las Vegas! We've been to this location twice and we've been very happy with the service and the food.   I usually get half of the shrimp with the hot and juicy sauce medium spicy. I got spicy on our first visit and it was way too spicy for me. The shrimps have been very fresh and they're pretty decent size. I also add the sausage - they're sliced thinly. I love how they give you options to get half a dozen or a dozen of slices sausages.   We tried out their catfish fried basket the second time we were there. We got 4 generous pieces and the breading is not too thick. You can get them with regular fries or Cajun fries.   We'll definitely come back here if we crave seafood.

photos.caption: Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Catfish fried basket.

mCXQVhcUaTJNG9E-SzW9Ug.text: Came here for lunch with my sisters and cousins. I had been here before, but that was years ago. There was not a big difference to the seafood in the Bay Area.   I had ordered one pound of shrimp. Mild level spice and Juicy Cajun seasoning. I had also ordered one corn and one sausage. The sauce was thick but not runny. I thought it was a bit spicy even though I got mild. I didn't use the gloves because coming from the Bay Area, we typically don't use it lol!   My sister's bf was allergic to shellfish and the waitress said that they reuse the same oil for ALL of their food. So unbeknownst to us, there was nothing on the menu he could eat! The waitress said that he could order outside food and bring it in the restaurant and eat with the group. I thought that was nice of them.   So caution to anyone who is allergic to seafood. You won't be able to eat anything. Not even the fries!   For those who aren't, this place was not bad. Good service, good food and pretty clean.

NqJpvzP7jbvPXXGuBnNCwQ.text: Alodia was the best server ever!! She made my first experience absolutely amazing!! She knew what she was talking about when it came to the menu!! The food was great also! #teamalodia

KG786v1fNNo9dsR6lWp4uA.text: We've been going to hot n juicy for years.  Why??? BC ITS SO DAMN DELICIOUS.  Roll your sleeves up, put on your bib and get ready to open your plastic bagged filled with some spicy goodness!!  We normally  the hot n juicy medium.  Heat but not enough to burn your tongue.  Peel and eat Shrimp are the easiest to eat, for the payout on the work.  Crawfish are tasty but it's a lot of work for the amount of "meat" you get.  Crab is crazy hard bc it's gets really messy. Thank goodness they have a sink that's outside of the bathroom to wash up.  Service is always friendly and prices are great.  Normally shrimp ranges from 11-13 a pound. If you don't mind getting a little dirty and working for your food.   This is definitely worth it
